body.name: hansubute Nonstick Induction Stone Frying Pan with Soft Touch Handle,Children Protection Function (8inch)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 20 mins
features: New Function : We put temperature sensitive accessory in the handle part .When the pan gets hot , the red part change to pink . This is the protection of your Child.
Stone Coating Palm Cookware : Stone-derived coating from Germany that achieves non-stick perfection. Free of APEO, PTFE, PFAS, PFOS, PFOA . Imitating the shape& texture of Marble stone(volcanic rock)
Soft Touch Bakelite Handle: The stone frying pans’ streamlined design integrated with bakelite handle adds to its comfort, convenience and slip resistance during cooking.

Multiple Use: Premium aluminum alloy material combined with magnetized base allows for rapid heat transfer and durability, suitable for use on cookware like induction, gas, ceramic, electric, halogen & solid fuel cookers. Not suitable for Oven. Dishwasher safe but washing by hand for long time using.

100% Satisfactory Guarantee: 30 days money back . Our stone Earth & Marble Pans for Cooking makes it easy to cook wonderful meal Like perfect pancake, stir-fry, casserole, curry, vegetables, omelets, potatoes, fajitas, quesadillas, and more. Or just fry sausages, seafood, poultry, burgers, toasting pine nuts or even toasting off some spices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NEW DESIGN Temperature Sensitive Accessory to Protect Your Child Easy Pour Out SOFT TOUCH HANDLE Comfortable Grip Woodgrain Texture MAGNETIZED BASE Superior Heat Transfer Suitable for All Stoves Durable 5mm die-cast Aluminum STONE NONSTICK COATING Scratch-Resistant and Easy to Clean 100% PFOA, PTFE, lead and cadmium free

Step 1: Please remove the packing material and all the tags. Clean it with detergent or warm water. Coats a thin layer of oil or other grease. Step 2:While cooking, plastic utensils and wooden tools are more suitable. Please note: if the cooker is empty, heating is not allowed. Step 3:When finish cooking, cool down the pan for 5 minutes to prevent warping. Clean with hot water and detergent by cloth.Soft side of cleaning sponge and Soft dish brush is also fine .For cleaning of stubborn food stain, you'd better soak the pot in hot water with detergent for a period of time.

Story Behind The Brand The "b" inside the hansubute is a Golden frying pan . That means we want to produce the precious frying pan . Hansubute wish to offer every customer a perfect pan , a nice non stick stone frying pan . Hansubute frying pan is not only a cookware ,but also an artwork . You will never regret to choose hansubute .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best non stick pan I own
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan. Nothing sticks to it which is the best part and I use it on my induction top. Comfortable handle grip, good weight, very durable, very nice looking, dishwasher safe, not too shallow with good side depth. Cooked eggs with no spray or butter and they cooked perfectly and didn't stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnetic induction capable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to compliment my purchase of a magnetic induction stove top. It is sturdy and fits the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The holy grail of cooking!! Magical and AMAZING!
reviews.reviewText: I am an experienced home cook. I cook at least 3 times a day, 7 days a week. I've had several, several different pan brands over the last 12 years, and I've been really disappointed. This pan is pure magic. Pure magic! First, it's aesthically pleasing. It's seriously just beautiful. Second, it's super, super easy to clean. Food just slides off, you really don't need much oil if ANY. It's absolutely wonderful.Since I bought it, I've made eggs, pancakes, fried tacos, ground beef, all manner of veggies and proteins. I've not found it to have a single issue yet. In fact, I love it so much that I'm going to buy the pot.There is a downside, I purchased the 12 inch, which may be bigger than most need, but it doesn't come with or have the option of purchasing a lid. No matter, I'm certain that is easily remedied. The other is, you may cry for the resources lost before you found this magical piece of kitchen ware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great non-stick performance in an attractive, light-weight pan.
reviews.reviewText: I love the size, feel, and looks of this pan. Most of all, I love how it cooks eggs and omelets, stick-free on my induction stove top. This pan is so nicely made, from the wooden handle, to the non-stick, granite surface. It is attractive and easy to use.I will continue to use my stainless steel and cast-iron pans for high-heat cooking and searing meats, but this pan is perfect for everything else. It is so easy to clean that I don't even use soap. I just rinse and dry. I plan on taking good care of this. I will not turn the heat up beyond the lowest, medium-high setting, and only use plastic or wood utensils with it. It is enjoyable to cook on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice pan. Lightweight and eggs slide out.
reviews.reviewText: Update: Love this pan but don’t submerge handle or lid in water. Steam builds up when used and will explode a chip in the handle. This Pan still works but you can see a little crack in the underside of the handle where pressure built up startled me good!!!Still easy to clean and my go to for no stick eggs.I have only used this pan about 20 times so far but my fried eggs just slide out. It rinses out clean and comes out of the water completely dry (every drop of water rolls off- I don't even need a towel)This pan is about the same weight as than my teflon frypan- maybe even a bit lighterThe handle is really smooth and doesn't get hot.This is a really nice pan. I like the way it looks, feels and washes. I plan to buy other sizes if available.Update: 2 years later and daily use= still loving it. So easy to clean. Indicator light doesn’t work anymore but I never paid it much attention anyway. I have used it multiple times every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a Pan!! Just love it. Best I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: I have an induction cooktop on my stove. I have used this pan at least once and sometimes three times a day for just over a month and it is one of the nicest, easiest to clean and best functioning pans I have ever owned in my 55 years of buying pans. The interior and exterior show no staining whatsoever. I didn't think I would like the wooden handle but it never gets too hot and just works. The Circulon pans I bought at Costco about five years ago performed well but the fry pans now look disgusting and this pan was my first replacement. I also bought the 9.5 inch pan and should receive the 11 inch today. Sold on the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This will do, it’s promising
reviews.reviewText: I don’t expect much from the non/toxic frying pans because I’ve had so many of them that end miserably. Of course I’ve dealt with the situation by looking at them as a semi-long term disposable item.This is my newest and it’s a little different. It seems a bit smaller but deeper pan, making it a nice implement for warming up leftovers. (God forbid microwaving!)The non-stick is pretty good thus far, but I never use it without a small bit of ghee.I like the spout on the side, that’s somewhat unusual in this type of pan, but the little silicone temperature gage is a bit silly because I can’t see the use for it myself. Of course that doesn’t really matter one way or another, just mentioning it because they advertise it as a “feature”, lolIt’s a nice little pan, light and comfortable to use, but I haven’t had it for very long so I don’t know when the replacement day will come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooking is much faster
reviews.reviewText: Heat is really distributed well and quickly with this pan. It's also super easy to clean because the non stick surface works great. I've used it daily for about 2 months. I had another brand of pan like this before but I ruined that one because I didn't realize how much hotter these pans can get. I kept burning everything and the non stick surface no longer worked. I eventually realized it was user error and not the product so I bought this one to give it another try. I learned I have to turn the heat down at least a full setting, so if I want medium heat I turn it to low. If I want low heat I turn it to warm. That's how much faster and more efficiently the core of this pan heats up and distributes the heat. Now that I know the trick it works perfectly and I love it.
La mejor compra qué he hecho nada se les pega, es muy importante el curado antes de usarlas.

In love much better than any tefal or the black pans I ever ownedEggs with almost no oil slides away like a olympic ice skater in a rink lol, and things get caramelised easy like mushrooms, meatballs everything gets a pretty colour on it of you know what I meanRecommend for sureI have been washing minimally as well by hand as I am so scared to ruin it lol
Excelente, no se pega , fácil de limpiar
Uno de los sartenes no trae el empaque rojo y tampoco embona bien el tornillo, por eso el mango queda flojo.
